text: The Adventures of Valdo & Marie is a 1996 adventure educational video game for Windows by Ubi Soft Entertainment Software. PC Team praised the game's commitment to being an educational historical adventure.http://download.abandonware.org/magazines/PC%20Team/pcteam_numero21/page%20072.jpg Joystick felt it offered a beautiful experience to players. Personal Computer Magazine thought the game offered a "highly entertaining learning environment". The game sold 100,000 copies in France alone. == References == Category:1996 video games Category:Adventure games Category:Educational video games Category:Video games developed in France Category:Windows games Category:Windows-only games
